E qui puoi saperne di più su di loro insieme a RTP, volatilità, vincita massima, scommessa, simboli, design e demo.
Stunt Stars: gameplay, RTP e Volatilità
Stunt Stars ha una griglia di gioco standard 5×3. Ma il numero di modi per ottenere una vincita sale a 243. I simboli devono comparire da sinistra a destra e trovarsi su rulli adiacenti. La combinazione massima di 5 può portare belle ricompense. Ma dipendono da una scommessa, che va da 0,3€ a 90€.
La percentuale di payout, che qui è del 95,99% e l’elevata volatilità, consentono al giocatore di ottenere grandi vincite, con frequenti acrobazie di giri mortali. Per quanto riguarda la vincita massima, in questa slot machine senza registrazione, è possibile toccare 17.010x la tua giocata.

I vari attori e attrici che eseguono le acrobazie, sono rappresentati tramite simboli. La slot ha uno stile da cartone animato di alta qualità. Questo crea uno scenario piacevole. Nella parte audio, ascolterai una bella musica che trasmette vibrazioni elettrizzanti.
Cominciamo col dire che i simboli di Stunt Stars portano belle ricompense. E i loro valori dipendono dalla categoria. Tra i valori bassi, ci sono i semi di carte con una puntata da 0,5x a 9x. I simboli di alto valore invece, sono il kit del pilota, il ciak, l’attore e l’attrice acrobatici. Possono premiarti fino a 30 volte la puntata.
In Stunt Stars puoi ottenere simboli speciali:

Lo Scatter Skydive garantisce 2x, 10x e 20x la puntata e un trigger Skydive Bonus,
Lo Scatter Stunt Double paga per 3, 4 o 5 simboli.
Il Wild Car sostituisce i simboli sulle payway ad eccezione degli Scatter. E appare solo sui rulli 2, 3 e 4.

Giri Bonus e Free Spin Gratuiti presenti in questa video slot

Sky Dive
Tre o più Skydive Scatter ti premiano con una partita bonus. Quindi scegli un personaggio. Lo stuntman salterà sopra l’elicottero e inizierà a raccogliere i seguenti simboli:Il cuore che dà 1 giro gratis, la stella che aggiunge i simboli Scatter Stunt Double ai giri gratuiti e il paracadute che termina la fase di salto e raccolta;
Gioco Demo Stunt Stars
Stunt Stars ha un gameplay emozionante e uno stile visivo. E tutto ciò che puoi vedere nella versione demo. Ti permette di imparare a giocare alla slot e verificarne le peculiarità senza depositi.

raw_translation.response:
Stunt Stars: An Explosive Slot Game Review

For those action film enthusiasts who crave for gunfights, explosions and dangerous chases, look no further than Stunt Stars, an online slot game from Lightning Box! In this review, we will explore its gameplay mechanics, RTP, volatility, maximum payout, betting range, symbols, design and demo.

Gameplay, RTP and Volatility
Stunt Stars features a standard 5×3 grid layout, with 243 ways to win. For a winning combination, symbols must align from left to right and appear on adjacent reels. The maximum combination of 5 can lead to handsome rewards, but it depends on a bet ranging from €0.3 to €90. With a payout rate of 95.99% and high volatility, players can secure large payouts with regular and daring spins. With a maximum payout of 17,010 times the wager, you can expect some heart-stopping thrills!

Stunt Stars Welcomes Players to a Film Set
The various actors and actresses performing acrobatics are represented with cartoonish high-quality symbols. With pleasant and electrifying music, Stunt Stars offers an immersive and thrilling experience.

Let's start with the symbols, which offer attractive rewards. The low-value symbols are the card suits, ranging from 0.5x to 9x the bet. The high-value symbols include the stunt kit, the clapper, the male and female stunt performers, which can reward up to 30 times the bet. In Stunt Stars, you can also look forward to special symbols:

- The Skydive Scatter guarantees 2x, 10x and 20x the bet and triggers the Skydive Bonus.
- The Stunt Double Scatter pays for 3, 4 or 5 symbols.
- The Car Wild replaces other symbols on the payline, except for the Scatter. It only appears on reels 2, 3 and 4.

Bonus Spins and Free Spins 
Sky Dive
If you land three or more Skydive Scatters, you will trigger a bonus game. As a player, you get to choose a character who skydives onto a helicopter and collects symbols such as hearts and stars, which offer one free spin and add Stunt Double Scatters to free spins, respectively. However, look out for parachutes, which mark the end of the jump and collection phase.

Stunt Stars Demo
Stunt Stars delivers a thrilling gameplay and visual experience, which can be enjoyed entirely for free with the demo version. It allows players to learn how to play the slot, see its unique features, and explore its mechanics without deposits!

Frequently Asked Questions
What is the highest paying symbol in Stunt Stars?
The female stunt actress symbol is the highest paying symbol offering 4x, 10x and 30x the bet.

Do I need to make a deposit to play Stunt Stars on Slotjava?
Only when you want to play with real money. The demo version does not require any money or deposits.

Can I reactivate free spins on Stunt Stars?
No, unfortunately, it is not possible to reactivate free spins in this Lightning Box video slot, but you can still receive extra free spins by registering on one of the licensed Italian casinos and requesting the welcome bonus.

Symbols and Design

', 'content': '

Buckle up and get ready for a wild ride on the film set with Stunt Stars—the online casino slot game that packs a punch. This game invites you to join the action with its high-quality, cartoonish symbols that depict actors and actresses performing acrobatics. The electrifying music and sound effects only add to the immersive experience.

'}

response.headline: Bonus Spins and Free Spins
response.content:
Stunt Stars doesn't just offer the usual bonus spins; it takes things to the extreme with the Sky Dive bonus game. You activate it by landing three or more Skydive Scatters - I wish real skydiving was this easy, but hey-ho - and from there, the fun begins.

You get to choose your character who then proceeds to skydive onto a helicopter to collect symbols - as one does. These symbols offer one free spin each, and as you progress, you can even add Stunt Double Scatters to your free spins. Just don't forget to keep an eye out for parachutes; otherwise, it will mark the end of the jump and end the collection phase.

Jumping out of a plane has never been so much fun - unless you're afraid of heights. Don't worry; there's always the mute button if you need to scream a little. If skydiving isn't your idea of entertainment, you can always stick to playing online casino games. I, for one, prefer to keep my feet firmly on the ground - less likelihood of tripping over, if you know what I mean.
